data.lyric:
[ti:It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas]
[ar:Perry Como]
[al:Christmas Hits, Vol. 1]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas - Perry Como (佩里·科莫)/The Fontane Sisters/Mitchell Ayres & His Orchestra
[00:13.06]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[00:16.14]
[00:17.90]Everywhere you go
[00:20.79]
[00:21.55]Take a look in the five and ten
[00:23.61]
[00:24.52]Glistening once again
[00:25.84]
[00:26.46]With candy canes and silver lanes aglow
[00:29.43]
[00:30.54]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[00:33.96]
[00:35.30]Toys in every store
[00:38.20]
[00:39.50]But the purdy-est sight to see
[00:41.42]Is the holly that will be on your own front door
[00:46.95]
[00:47.81]A pair of hop-a-long boots and a pistol that shoots
[00:50.44]Is the wish of barney and ben
[00:52.03]
[00:52.76]Dolls that will talk and will go for a walk
[00:54.68]Is the hope of janice and jen
[00:56.26]
[00:57.05]And mom and dad can hardly wait for school to start again
[01:00.77]
[01:05.41]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[01:08.71]
[01:10.37]Everywhere you go
[01:12.93]
[01:14.01]Now there's a tree in the grand hotel
[01:16.34]
[01:16.94]One in the park as well
[01:18.36]
[01:18.90]The sturdy kind that doesn't mind the snow
[01:23.13]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[01:26.32]
[01:27.75]Soon the bells will start
[01:30.94]
[01:31.58]And the thing that will make them ring
[01:33.91]Is the carol that you sing
[01:36.09]Right within your heart
[01:40.25]
[01:57.63]A pair of hop-a-long boots and a pistol that shoots
[02:00.20]Is the wish of barney and ben
[02:01.86]
[02:02.44]Dolls that will talk and will go for a walk
[02:04.58]Is the hope of janice and jen
[02:05.97]
[02:06.52]And mom and dad can hardly wait for school to start again
[02:10.24]
[02:15.03]It's beginning to look a lot like christmas
[02:18.39]
[02:19.77]Soon the bells will start
[02:22.64]
[02:23.70]And the thing that will make them ring
[02:25.82]Is the carol that you sing
[02:27.99]Right within your heart
